reviewText: This set is a nice set to have, but don't pay this much. All of these movies are available individually for sale as well. it may be cheaper to get them that way. The people selling these are just ridiculous for asking $385.00. All of these movies are FULL FRAME ONLY also. I paid $26.00 for this set online at walmart awhile back. In my opinion, it's worth the $30 dollars, but that's about it. Find these movies on here or ebay individually for cheaper, if the boxset is priced this ridiculous, and you have to have the whole collection. the complete set of all movies is 125 dollars on ebay as of 10/12/13
awesome. i love it. thanks alot. its an awesome collection to add to the original and the remake. got em all now.
